text: Akkayapalle is a census town in Visakhapatnam district in the state of Andhra Pradesh, India. ==Demographics== India census, Akkayapalle had a population of 18,247. Males constitute 51% of the population and females 49%. Akkayapalle has an average literacy rate of 62%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with 58% of the males and 42% of females literate. 14% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Villages in Kadapa district
title: Akkayapalle
